programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After a health scare the kids decide to reunite Mr Robinson with his son. Mr Robinson has always seen Rocky as a disappointment so when Gumball and Darwin help him land a corporate job at Chanax, he is thrilled. However the Chanax corporation is not quite what it seems. Can Gumball and Darwin rescue Rocky before he becomes a corporate drone for all eternity?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball jaywalks and is pulled over by Donut Cop. When Gumball objects he is told that even the smallest misdemeanour can lead to a breakdown in law. In an effort to impress the kids Donut Cop takes them for a ride-along in his cop car and gets carried away, progressively breaking the law himself. He soon proves that the tiniest offense can indeed snowball into complete lawlessness!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. The Wattersons figure maybe hes allergic to something. After a few guesses, they come to the conclusion that he is allergic to stupidity. Being surrounded by stupid people, this is something of a problem. And they need to find a solution before Darwins increasingly explosive sneezes destroy the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day, and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for "The Best Mom in the World". Clearly Nicole Watterson is the Best Mom, but Tobias and BJ just wont admit it... So they organise a mom-off at the mall between Nicole, Banana Barbara and Jackie Wilson. Needless to say it gets pretty intense.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons receive an unmarked package in the mail. To distract themselves from the urge to open it, they all take turns to imagine what it might contain. To Mom it could mean financial freedom, to Gumball it could mean superpowers: to whoever its actually for, it means theyre not getting their package.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party, and have to bring a date! / Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Miss Simian discovers a failed test from Gumballs past that brings down his grade point average. This means he has to retake kindergarten all over again, much to her delight. But by demoting him Miss Simian has inadvertently brought herself down, and theyre left with no choice but to team up if they want things back to normal.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin discover the reason Dads diet wasnt working was that he was actually on ten diets: and eating a meal for each of them. They eventually manage to help him lose weight, but Richards newfound buffness also brings out his more obnoxious side.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball discovers that Rob, his old nemesis, is "neme-seeing" someone else now. Devastated that Rob has fallen out of hate with him, Gumball refuses to accept that his ex-nemesis has moved on and does his best to sabotage Robs blossoming relationship with his new foe, Banana Joe.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When they see the school bullies making fun of Sussie Gumball and Darwin decide to try and help her act less weird. They carefully observe her behavior and decide that the only thing they have to change is absolutely everything.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss just happened to capture Lamput last night, so this morning hes on top of the world!! But disaster strikes; during his morning ablutions, the Boss makes a fatal slip of the clippers, and his glorious Tache goes tumbling to the bathroom tiles. Its a catastrophic turn of events for the poor old coot... turns out hes got a raft of deep-seated family issues wrapped up in that white crest of lip-fur. Kindly Lamput takes pity on the poor emasculated Bossman, and helps him sneak back into the lab and get his hands on the tache-restorative formula. It all goes well. Well... well ish. Boss is happy - he gets his glorious mo back. The catch is, literally everyone else does too. You dont really understand someone until youve walked a mile in their tache.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput spends the day at the beach, and, in a pair of swimming trunks, cuts a fine figure indeed. That is to say; a small, round and blobby figure. It only takes one snide comment from a fellow beach-goer to bring Lamputs body issues to the surface. When youre a shape changer, though, theres no need for exercise; before long Lamput is strutting along as an orange amalgam of all the best-looking sunbakers. On the up side, its a handy disguise when the Docs come a-hunting. On the down side? Well, its kind of tiring pretending to be someone youre not. Lamput learns an important lesson from a nearby blobby little girl. Be yourself, and if anyones got a problem with that, they can go find their own patch of sand.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. After spending a day in the cold, the Stump Kids return to Craigs house to warm themselves up - they are promised grilled cheese sandwiches but have to wait before they are ready, so they decide to find things to do in the house while they do so like drinking hot cocoa, playing video games, and taking part in a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. It is time for the annual Winter Creeklympics, and the Stump Kids are doing everything they can to win a gold medal at them for the first time - however, when every new event sees them seem to get farther and farther away from winning anything, the group ultimately learn that it is better to have fun than simply take all the glory.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig builds a "snowme" and convinces Kelsey and JP to do the same - this results in some interesting new houses as Bobby joins in the fun, but they soon decide that they need to get jobs to maintain their new lifestyles. Feeling that they are overworked, they decide to fight back against their "boss" - an inflatable clown - but then into more trouble...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig is on his own when he discovers an abandoned playhouse in the middle of a frozen lake and ends up running into his rival Wildernessa - the pair end up bickering and arguing over their differing views when they are left stranded after the lake ice breaks, but a huddle in the playhouse to escape the cold proves to be highly beneficial for the duo.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day and the Titans compete to determine which of them is the best mom and deserves all the gifts.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: Robin takes the other Titans on a trip.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: The Titans are looking for a villain to fight.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: Robin hatches a plan to get rich off pennies.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny might be a man of science, but hes more than happy to get his fortune told for a laugh. The palm-reader sees alarming visions of Skinnys near future; mostly visions that relate to Skinny being squashed, smooshed or otherwise smeared. Its kind of Skinnys own fault; maybe if he paid a bit less attention to chasing Lamput and a bit more attention to not getting squashed, smooshed or smeared, he wouldnt need constant rescuing by a frazzled mystic.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball has to save Mr Robinsons life during Elmores Senior Talent Show!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball tries to save Darwin from being kissed by a girl.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Principal Brown tries to "fix" Gumballs dysfunctional family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin babysit Anais "responsibly", whilst "irresponsibly" flooding the house.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises that Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. Following a series of clues is her only chance to track them down, and her only hope of learning what happened to Daisy. But as the mystery unravels, it seems the culprits may have turned on each other.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When an unknown figure shows up and insults their Mom the kids are expecting a massive showdown but are surprised when Mom chooses the path of peace. Mom explains Yuki Masamis mother is an old school friend and repeatedly refuses to fight her despite further provocation. However when Yuki threatens to get Mom fired from her job Mom has no choice but to partake in a rematch of a karate match her and Yuki had fought as children.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. Clips include Banana Joes self-choreographed acrobatics, Richards latest culinary invention and Gumball and Darwins contest for who can pull the weirdest face.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When we last saw Gumball, he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote, just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. The remote has now taken Gumball back to the beginning of that disastrous day. Armed with the knowledge of what this day has in store, he must try and stop Rob from destroying his life.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When a substitute teacher fills in for Chef, Duncan thinks its going to be the best day ever. Hes wrong.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Owens newly found gloves make him great at everything. But this greatness comes at a high price.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When Gwens favorite event, the Zombie March, falls on the same day as Beths nightmare event, dental hygienist check upday, the two girls find a way to help each other out.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Owen pretends to be Izzys pet dinosaur after leading her to believe she dug him up in the school playground.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richards got a motorcycle helmet stuck on his head, so when he goes into a bank the terrified staff all assume hes there to rob the place and hand over a load of cash. Richard leaves with the money, completely oblivious to the fact hes just performed a stick-up. Nicole and the kids soon tell him what hes done and try to figure out a way to avoid the police manhunt and return the cash.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Leslies petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading, Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him. The only problem is they know nothing about style or beauty. As Gumball and Darwins methods become more extreme, Leslie questions whether hes prepared to make the ultimate sacrifice for beauty.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons fear the worst when they are summoned to a Town Hall meeting, but are pleasantly surprised when theyre offered a brand new house. Until they discover its in a different state! The Mayor of Elmore has decided they are bringing down the real estate value of the entire town so the family have to prove that theyre upstanding members of the community.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: No matter what Gumball does, Carmen thinks she knows better. Gumball attempts to gain the moral high ground but fails... The only option left is to bring Carmen down to his level. 15 mins, U (2011) (CC)

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the kids find out that Moms life hasnt panned out exactly as shed hoped, they try to make her day a bit easier by taking on her chores. However, they accidentally grab her bucket list instead of her to-do list and end up attempting to tick off all of Nicoles life goals.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector, Elmores resident Giant.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole has decided its time to throw out the familys refrigerator. This doesnt go down too well with Richard as its his favorite possession. When it turns out the refrigerator is also a magical storage facility for childhood emotions and memories it makes sense that Richard is having a hard time letting go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. The whole town embrace this festival and get excited about the arrival of the Sluzzle Dude; leaving it to Gumball and Anais to keep everyones Sluzzle Tag dreams alive.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. Miss Simian warns them about the Butterfly Effect whereby the flap of an insects wings can start a tornado on the other side of the world. Paying no heed, Gumball releases the emergent butterfly into the wild, where it causes havoc upon Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Things keep going missing in the house, so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. They discover that a mysterious person has been secretly living in their home. Gumball and Darwin manage to turn this confused squatter into their mortal enemy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. When they find one that depicts Gumball running naked through the mall, Gumball is determined not to let it come to pass. However events conspire against him, and Gumball learns that sometimes you cant fight fate.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. He tries to protect them from the world around them and soon Darwins over-protective control-freakery spreads to every corner of Elmore. The Wattersons have no choice but to overthrow his despotic regime.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. Gumball and Darwin help Anais make up an imaginary friend who, much to all their surprise, appears in front of them. Gumball and Darwin teach Anais and her new friend how to become friends, but soon realise that he might not be so imaginary after all...

programme.desc: Gumball and Hotdog Kid discover why theyre so awkward with each other.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When their neighbour tries to bring over a package for them, Gumball and Darwin realise they have never learned his name, and its way too late to ask. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball finds Pennys laugh annoying, but cant think of a way to tell her without offending her. When he discovers that Principal Brown has the same problem with Miss Simians morning breath, they decide to swap problems to save themselves from getting dumped.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame well never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Chef is knocked unconscious right before a School Board Evaluator shows up for a big review. Now Owen has to fill in so Chef doesnt lose his Teaching License and to ensure the kids earn the pony ride Chef promised for good behaviour.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: After having a chocolate bar confiscated by Chef, Beth finds herself in a parallel giant world and aims to get back her now giant chocolate bar.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Easter Bunny is sick, so she hires The Looney Builders to take over the festivities and ensure Looneyburg has a great Easter.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders help Wile E. Coyote build a telescope to view the Looney Moon, Tweety must face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. / Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. / Mr Bean finally has a showdown with the mysterious Reliant Robin. Who will be the victor? / Mr Bean has to get the bride to the church on time...anyway he can!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The Ryder family completes a drill in the event of a Starquake. Shields are deployed around Home and Dads museum on the moon. Actors: Ava Augustin, Jack Molloy-Legault, Eleanor Noble, Felicia Shulman, . Director: Freek Quartier,Tom Van Gestel.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The first episode of an animated series for younger viewers set in the distant future and following a seven-year-old girl called Ella as she gleefully tests her limits in a star-filled playground called the Milky Way. Ella borrows Slippys lucky charm Mooncake for a space mission - however, when Mooncake gets trapped in a black hole, the charm must be rescued and returned before Slippy realises this.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: On the eve of Dad opening his museum of human artifacts on the moon, Ella and Slippy help him by "fixing" a lunar rover until it drives off, with Glitch on board! Determined to fix this themselves, our gang understands its best to admit your mistake and ask for help.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean

Can Toad now ever return? / Toad enlists his friends to help him make a superhero movie but his overbearing ego means they soon leave him to his own devices.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad enlists his friends to help him make a superhero movie but his overbearing ego means they soon leave him to his own devices. But when the Weasels trick him, he finds himself in a pickle without his friends to help.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game. / While trying to stop the Lemmings Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. / The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch his favorite program. / The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game. / While trying to stop the Lemmings Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. / The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. / The Lemmings have unearthed a strange little gadget from amongst the Forest Rangers belongings: a hand spinner. / The Lemmings play with figurines of wild Canadian animals.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: During training at the Hero Base, the SuperThings mistake Kid Fury for a villain because of his yellow eyes.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is locked in a department store overnight and has the time of his life. / Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Animated adventure series following Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred as they travel around on what could be their final summer break together. When an artificial intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerised mystery and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology...

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Animated adventure series following Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred as they travel around on what could be their final summer break together. The gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways - unfortunately, the plane is also beset by a gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne in the pilot seat!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that theyve lost their lives purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the labs hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After the Docs constantly fail to catch Lamput with the power of science and technology, they come across an unlikely source to help them with their troubles - Magic! A witch offers them a magic marker that gives them any supernatural powers they draw on their skin. Lamput must now escape and Skinny with their new magical power!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its a night out at the theatre for the Docs but when they spot Lamput in the front row, they decide to give up their night of culture for a night of capture! Lamput escapes backstage where he morphs from scenery into props, then into costume and eventually ends up on stage! The Docs make chase, and end up becoming part of the performance too, much to the Directors dismay. Can the show go on? Or will it be a total flop?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When King Tut steals an ancient artifact that makes his Carcophagus magically fast, MOE equips Bam with rocket boosters to catch the villain and Bam must learn how to control all that speed.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary, but Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent as Batman and Bam pursue her.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice brings a big shell back from vacation for Lewis. But when she gets to Wonderland, the Queen wants to keep it for herself! So Alice tells her that the shell is, in fact, her crown, meaning she too is a queen! Wonderlands sovereign believes this fib and decides to coach Alice in the art of queenhood, or, more precisely, the Art of Being a Queen of Hearts! Lewis is deeply concerned, for good reason: Alice is playing along with the monarch so much that shes actually starting to act like her!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice hears a noise in her room at night and gets scared. Its Lewis, calling her from Wonderland: he needs to go to the Valley of the Night to harvest some new piano keys and hes scared to go alone. Alice goes with. As they walk through the valley (where its constantly nighttime), they get spooked out by eerie noises… until they realize its just the dark playing havoc with their imagination. But when they get to the Nasty Trees, its a whole different story…

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: David cant bear to part with his bike even though hes outgrown it. Barney takes the kids on a high-seas adventure, where David helps a hermit crab find a better-fitting shell and accepts its time for a new bike.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: The kids notice Grady is sad and Barney shows them that simple acts of kindness go a long way. Barney adds a dash of magic to the kids actions that inspire others, allowing everyone to see the magnitude and power of simple acts of kindness.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerrys home, HIS home. Tom finds this funny, of course. Franky Two-Face leads Tom to believe the two are working together but Frankys a no-good, dirty rat. He doesnt play fair. Hes a liar, a sneak, a dirty player, just an all-around dirty rat. He goes to the cats in the alley, says Jerry thinks theyre soft, steals things from Spike and sets Tom up as the thief. Franky Two-Face knows every dirty trick in the book, except one; the one Tom and Jerry use to get rid of Franky Two-Face.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Toms bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble around the cottage. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better! Jerrys loving the change at first, but he soon tires of the touchy-feely feline (even Newt is tiring of Toms affections). Jerry tries every mouse trick in the book to trigger Toms animal instincts, but nothing seems to break the spell. Jerry has to sneak Hildies wand to reverse the spell, but it wont be easy with tag-along-Tom by his side every step of the way!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom again ends up on the losing end of a little cat-and-mouse, Butch sends in Meathead to deal with Jerry. Surprisingly, Meathead has no trouble catching the little mouse. Theres nothing Tom or Jerry can do to make it harder. Jerrys superior intelligence is no match for Meatheads dumb luck.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom chases Jerry into the local Natural History Museum. The chase continues until the two combatants realise theyve been locked inside for the night. Its a spooky place after lights-out and made even spookier by the entrance of the museums guard dog, Rocky. Rocky takes his job very seriously and Tom - whos dealt with this sadistic canine before - frantically tries to avoid detection by blending into the various museum displays (Sabre-Tooth Cat, Cave Lion, an Eskimo hunting seal, spear carrier for a Neanderthal hunting party, etc.). But mischievous Jerry repeatedly rats him out. Its all fun and games until Jerry realises Rocky hates mice as much as he hates cats. Theyll ultimately have to work together to outsmart Rocky and survive this night of fright in the museum.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items theyve taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home, but they dont want to be separated!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive Spike enlists their help. Spike must do everything he can from losing his temper in front of Tyke when Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. He watches the Lemmings vain attempts to open the safe with amusement, until he realizes that the string around his neck with the key is far from indestructible.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput faints of thirst on a desert highway, so already its not a great day for the little orange shape-shifter. Add to that the fact that Specs and Skinny just happen by in a lockup van, and things go south pretty promptly. Specs and Skinny learn a valuable lesson: maybe if youre going to anger a morphing super-blob by throwing them in the back of a van and withholding precious water, you shouldnt do it whilst driving by a 100 foot cliff drop down to the open ocean. Hopefully these Docs are better swimmers than your average academic.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. Trying to make Mrs Wicket aware of the danger and save Scrapper and Teddy from being blown to smithereens takes courage nerve and a Bean styled homemade bomb disposal kit.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued. / Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. / The Great Eduardo violinist supreme is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that he claims that he can play the violin better. / Mr Bean is in a trance - barks like a dog and starts to dance.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! / Mr Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault. / Mr Bean has to look after an injured Mrs Wicket whose demands start to become a pain. / Mr Bean builds a car washing machine that attracts all manner of customers.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.sub-title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes a famous internet sensation. / Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesnt trust. / Mr Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of romance is very different from his girlfriends. / Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput escapes from the Lab, the Boss gives the job of orange-blob-retrieval to Doc Specs and Doc Skinny, who turn out to really suck at orange-blob-retrieval. Lamput gives them the slip again and again, and, true to form, the Docs decide to blame their tools. They convince the Boss to let them use more and more expensive vehicles, using an age-old corporate strategy commonly referred to as "diminishing returns". For scientists, these dudes sure are slow learners.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: David cant bear to part with his bike even though hes outgrown it. Barney takes the kids on a high-seas adventure, where David helps a hermit crab find a better-fitting shell and accepts its time for a new bike.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: The kids notice Grady is sad and Barney shows them that simple acts of kindness go a long way. Barney adds a dash of magic to the kids actions that inspire others, allowing everyone to see the magnitude and power of simple acts of kindness.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: After discovering that the King has never celebrated his birthday, Alice and Lewis set about finding out what would make him happy. But hes so obsessed with being a good sovereign that their job proves more difficult than expected. The problem is: his majesty is so used to helping other people at the drop of a hat and bending over backwards for them that hes unable to do anything for himself! So our two heroes pull out all the stops to make sure the King ignores his "rescue missions" for a while so he can concentrate on finding a hobby of his own.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice decides to accompany Lewis on his trip to deliver vitamins to the Rainbow. Its a pretty risky operation, involving climbing a very long wire, but Lewis is fearless thanks to his "balance button." However, when he drops the button halfway, its panic all round! In the end, thanks to Alice, Lewis realizes that in order to accomplish his mission, he doesnt need to recover his "balance button" after all - he merely needs to restore his self-confidence!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. The Batwheels zoom into action when the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Animated adventure series following the Scooby gang as they solve their own personal problems and the endless mind-bending mysteries that await them elsewhere. The gang goes trick or treating on Halloween night, but Velma seems to think that Halloween is a disrespect to history while Daphne, Shaggy and Scooby have the opposite opinion - meanwhile, Fred believes that you cant solve a mystery on Halloween... a view thats explained when the gang runs into a witch that Fred has met before.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Doc Specs and Lamput finds themselves stranded on an island. Will they be able to get home? Or maybe they will make a new home on the island. Has Doc Specs traded Doc Skinny for Lamput as his best friend? Crazier things have happened!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is caught but makes a new friend, Tuzki who comes to his rescue!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, its chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame well never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbours pet gerbil.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Beans sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Beans DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentists chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Beans antics?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny might be a man of science, but hes more than happy to get his fortune told for a laugh. The palm-reader sees alarming visions of Skinnys near future; mostly visions that relate to Skinny being squashed, smooshed or otherwise smeared. Its kind of Skinnys own fault; maybe if he paid a bit less attention to chasing Lamput and a bit more attention to not getting squashed, smooshed or smeared, he wouldnt need constant rescuing by a frazzled mystic.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm. In a secret room, he glimpses a human form by the light of a lightning bolt. Terrified, Grizzy unwittingly sets off a mechanism which had been activated by the lightning, and which brings to life a medieval armor. The living armor bows before the flabbergasted bear. Grizzy has just found a docile and fearsome ally with whom to combat the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen. But Grizzy wants to paint himself on the next painting and swipes the artwork along with the rodents paint kit. The furious Lemmings are determined to recover their material at all costs. Its the beginning of a dispute that could be qualified as… artsy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle. The rodents catch up with it on a mystical nearby isle, where they meet five fairies. One of them breathes life into the musical instrument. The Lemmings return to the castle with five sets of enchanted pipes and catapult Grizzy far away. Its his turn to discover the mysterious isle.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap. In his prison, Grizzy finds a magic shepherds crook. Now he can direct the neighboring sheep according to his desires. With their help, he manages to escape from his dungeon. He returns to the cabin and settles in on the flock like on a sofa, while the Lemmings stare in disbelief!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room. The Lemmings activate a secret mechanism, transforming their surroundings into a "heroic fantasy" world where they are elves, the sheep are goblins, and Grizzy is a magician. The jelly cake battle now takes on epic dimensions!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them. But smelling the scent of Grizzys cookies in the cabin, the sheep abandons them. The bears heart is softened by the little ball of wool and consents to share (some of) his snack. He pampers the creature and grows fond of it, but the rodents want their pal back!

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Kai and Finn must prevent the cinemas destruction during a fight between Pop Shock and Bubbles, caused by poor-quality popcorn.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Animated adventure series following Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred as they travel around on what could be their final summer break together. When an artificial intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerised mystery and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology...

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Animated adventure series following Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred as they travel around on what could be their final summer break together. The gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways - unfortunately, the plane is also beset by a gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne in the pilot seat!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing. The impact of their crash-landing cracks a black and white tile representing Yin and Yang and a strange light pours over the raccoon. Depending on his mood, the color of his fur changes, and his excitement or calm become contagious to all those around him!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down… especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

Grizzy tries to sabotage their improvised kitesurfing game to recover whats rightfully his, until a sharks fin appears on the horizon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of… a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Marvin the Martian and his Martian crew a space station.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders discover Zippy, an acrobatic flea, living on Sylvesters back.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes in search of wildlife but he isnt expecting to see anything prehistoric! / Mr Bean has to look after an injured Mrs Wicket whose demands start to become a pain. / Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. / Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up on stage at the opera house...in a dress! / Mr Bean becomes a taxi driver after being locked in a taxi. / Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ellas super excited to check out the Orion flare stars with her family. Shes been looking forward to it for weeks. But when Madhu asks a favour and Slippy calls her for help, Ella cant say no and might miss the festival entirely! Can she use science to get there in time?

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Tillys playtime results in the smashing of precious crystals that are part of Moms meticulous experiments. Determined to replace them, Ella battles a pulsar and then a super-hot planet before she realizes her sidelined little sister could be a big help!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. Hes so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. Its up to Ella to jog Madhus memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.desc: When they discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When they find an old book on traditional Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: Where Theres a Will Theres a Wraith
programme.desc: Animated adventure series following Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred as they travel around on what could be their final summer break together. programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs spot Lamput in the audience of a magic show and try to catch him. The chase takes them backstage where Lamput evades the Docs with the help of different magic contraptions until Specs and Skinny unknowingly ends up on stage. They become reluctant assistants to the Magician who is about to perform some death-defying tricks - with the help of the Docs!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribes prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters while trying to catch Lamput.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice loathes injustice and never hesitates to call someone out on it. But while defending the Cards against the Queen, she finds out that standing up to the powers that be can sometimes have negative consequences: shes now banished from Wonderland!! In an effort to get Her Majesty to cancel her punishment and change the way she treats her subjects, Alice teaches Lewis and the Cards a method of fighting back that is completely foreign to the Wonderlanders: going on strike! Sometimes, safety in numbers really is the way to go!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Its Painting Day today and everyone is to make a picture of the Queen! Delighted at being a part of it, Alice grabs some art materials from the Twins caravan. Except, she picks up absorbent paint by mistake, and, a few brush strokes later, the Queen winds up imprisoned inside Alices canvas! Alice feels so bad, so she and her friends do everything in their power to find a way to get Queeny out of there, before she gets stuck inside the picture for eternity!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: The kids are making a quilt for Barneys birthday featuring their favorite things to do with Barney. David has a hard time choosing just one thing, so Baby Bop and Billy help him decide just in time for the party.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel discovers the sunglasses she found belong to Grady, she still wants to keep them. Barney creates a high- seas adventure, where Mel realizes shes acting like a pirate taking what doesnt belong to her and returns the glasses.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Like a big brother Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed makes them both breakfast gets Tuffy cleaned up puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol cat to the house next door where Winston waits greeting his students a gaggle of mice including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion and today theyre going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Toms house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom who chooses instead to use the mouses down time to taunt the little guy and eat all of his favorite treats. Jerry resorts to help from Uncle Pecos who, after trying a few Texas remedies, mixes a home brewed Texas tonic to knock the cold p-p-p-plum out. As a side effect of the Tabasco fueled brew, the mouse is breathing fire within minutes. When Tom catches the same cold and gets a dose of the brew, its an all-out flame war! Good thing Uncle Pecos is there to put the fire out!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items theyve taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home but they dont want to be separated!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks hes pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Toms wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom. / A Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year. / Butch spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! / Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing, Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel. Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger is in charge of taking care of her mothers bird. Tom tries his hardest to keep from eating the bird but cant control himself. He gets kicked out by Ginger and feels guilty. Tom and Jerry work together to keep the bird safe from Butch.

programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput has escaped yet again, and yet again, Specs and Skinny are in serious trouble with the Boss. Hes so fed up with their constant failure that he hires an out-of-towner: a super cool, hi-tech Doc who has all the moves and the attitude to match. The new guys hip to all of Lamputs tricks, and before long, the shape shifting blob is safely back at the Lab. Specs and Skinny, robbed of their whole gig, end up on the streets, while Rival Doc gets all the glory. With glory comes blame, though, and when Lamput stages yet another signature crafty escape, the Boss turns all his fury on Rival Doc. Who hired this guy, anyway!? Lamput just wants things to be how they were. The orange blob helps the Docs get back their jobs at the Lab, Rival Doc is sent packing, and Lamput prepares yet another daring escape.

programme.title: Barneys World

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: In order to get her confiscated skateboard back from the Queen (her aunt), Dinah must give her the "perfect gift." Easy peasy: it just so happens that Lewis has a gift-making machine! Having said that, in order to manufacture the gift, the girl must use objects that match the Queens tastes. And since Dinah is in such a hurry to get her skateboard back, she neglects this fact, making the situation even worse. So much so that the Queen says shell keep the skateboard forever! But with Alice and Lewis help, Dinah learns more about her aunt, enabling her to come up with a gift the monarch really likes, and retrieve her precious skateboard as a result.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: After skidding out of control, the Queen loses her crown a little too long for comfort: as per the official rules, this deprives her de facto of her royal powers. At least now the tables can be turned: she can step into the shoes of her subjects, for once, and find out what its like to be a commoner. Or at least thats what Alice is planning: unbeknownst to Lewis, she has hidden the precious crown on purpose: this little life lesson will do the Queen the world of good!

programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.
